app_description: Master your studies with multi-format, minimalistic flashcard decks. Brain-friendly spaced repetition to boost retention and ace your exams.
login_disclaimer: By signing in, you agree to our Terms and Privacy Policy.
access_denied_login_required: Access Denied: Please sign in to continue.
whitelist_beta_blocked_user: Access Denied: Your email domain is not whitelisted for this beta version. Please contact support for more information.
get_started_subtitle: Just follow these simple steps to start your learning journey:
step_1_desc: Customize and [import your JSON-based flashcard decks]({navigate_to_import_json}) with ease or find them in the [Public Library]({navigate_to_library}) section.
step_2_desc: Filter flashcards by tags, subjects, or difficulty levels. Study by playing multiple sessions every day to boost retention. Start studying now by navigating to [My Bookshelf]({navigate_to_bookshelf}).
import_json_page_subtitle: Upload your flashcard deck in JSON format below to import it into your bookshelf. Formatting standards can be found in the first step. Using a PC is recommended for this process.
import_json_step_1_desc: Choose your favorite text editor and ensure your JSON file follows the required format. Refer to the guidelines provided in this step.
import_json_step_2_desc: Select your JSON file from your device to upload it for import.
import_json_step_3_desc: Review the imported data and confirm to add the flashcard deck to your bookshelf.
import_json_step_4_desc: Your deck has been added to your bookshelf. If the deck is public, it is now visible in the Public Library for other users to explore.
import_json_step_1_formatting_guidelines: ### JSON Structure Guide The file must be a standard **.json** file with a single root object containing the following fields: #### 1. Deck Details (Root) - **`title`** *(string, required)*: The name of your deck. - **`description`** *(string, optional)*: A short summary of the contents. - **`is_public`** *(boolean, optional)*: Set to `true` to make it visible to others (default: `false`). - **`cards`** *(array, required)*: A list of card objects. #### 2. Card Details (Inside 'cards' array) - **`front_content`** *(string, required)*: The question or prompt. Supports Markdown & HTML. - **`back_content`** *(string, required)*: The answer or solution. Supports Markdown & HTML. - **`tags`** *(array of strings, optional)*: Categories for filtering (e.g., `["Asia", "Capitals"]`). - **`source`** *(string, optional)*: Reference to textbook or URL. - **`base_difficulty`** *(integer, optional)*: A number from 1 to 5. - `1`: Easiest - `2`: Easy - `3`: Medium (Default) - `4`: Hard - `5`: Hardest --- #### Example File ```json { "title": "World Geography", "description": "Essential capitals and physical geography features.", "is_public": true, "cards": [ { "front_content": "What is the capital of **Japan**?", "back_content": "Tokyo", "tags": ["Asia", "Capitals"], "base_difficulty": 1 }, { "front_content": "Which is the longest river in South America?", "back_content": "The Amazon River", "tags": ["South America", "Rivers"], "base_difficulty": 2 }, { "front_content": "Which country spans the most **time zones**?", "back_content": "France (12 time zones)", "tags": ["Trivia", "Global"], "base_difficulty": 4, "source": "Guinness World Records" } ] } ```
import_json_step_1_warning: Remember that performing formatting-based attacks (e.g., XSS) is prohibited and may lead to account suspension.
import_json_step2_val_error: A value error occurred during import: {error_msg}
unexpected_error_occurred: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact support.
public_library_page_subtitle: Explore and discover flashcard decks shared by our community. Find decks on various subjects and topics to enhance your learning experience.
error_adding_deck2bookshelf: Could not add deck to bookshelf. Please try again.
bookshelf_page_subtitle: Access and manage your personal collection of flashcard decks here. Start studying and track your progress to enhance your learning journey.
bookshelf_no_decks: You haven't added any decks to your bookshelf yet. Explore the Public Library to find decks that interest you or import them via JSON!
starting_session: Starting session for Active Deck ID: {id}...
confirm_delete_active_deck_message: Are you sure you want to delete this active deck and all its associated study sessions? This action cannot be undone.
no_cards_found_filter: No cards found with the selected filters. Please adjust your criteria.
knowledge_acquired: All Knowledge Acquired from this Session!
session_complete_msg: You've completed the study session! Great job on your dedication to learning.
